resources.string: Import Texture Packs, Add-ons, and Worlds into Minecraft

1. Click "Select File" to choose your file:
 • .mcpack for texture packs
 • .mcaddon for add-ons
 • .mcworld for worlds
2. Once selected, click "Load it" to import into Minecraft
3. The app will automatically open Minecraft with your content
